  • Uses of AddSurrogateKey in ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.core.refactorings

    Methods in ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.core.refactorings that return AddSurrogateKey
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static AddSurrogateKey
    AddSurrogateKey.toNodes(String primaryLabel, String... additionalLabels)
    Provides a refactoring adding a surrogate key to all the nodes that match at least the primary label and optionally some additional labels.
    static AddSurrogateKey
    AddSurrogateKey.toNodesMatching(String customQuery)
    Adds a surrogate key to all nodes matching the custom query.
    static AddSurrogateKey
    AddSurrogateKey.toRelationships(String type)
    Provides a refactoring adding a surrogate key to all the relationships that match the given type.
    static AddSurrogateKey
    AddSurrogateKey.toRelationshipsMatching(String customQuery)
    Adds a surrogate key to all relationships matching the custom query.
    AddSurrogateKey
    AddSurrogateKey.withGeneratorFunction(String name)
    Alters the generator function to be used.
    AddSurrogateKey
    AddSurrogateKey.withProperty(String name)
    Alters the name of the property that is used for the surrogate key.
